EmailTemplate.name: JXL Savings
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Group Healthcare Benefits
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to make sure you knew about our exclusive group healthcare benefits with JXl solutions. As an FTS Plus+ member, you, your drivers and their families have access to a full range of healthcare benefits at group rates.
Guarantee-issue medical coverage Fully insured prescription coverage Dental and vision insurance Disability protection Term life & permanent whole life Cancer and critical illness enhancements
Recruit and retain quality drivers by offering these great benefits. For more details, visit ftsplus.com/jxl or call us at 800.479.1742. If you simply want to pass this information along to your drivers who can sign up on their own, direct them to ftsplus.com/jxldrivers.
Your Member ID: {!Account.Member_ID__c} Your Password: {!Account.Web_Password__c}
Thank you, Nancy Gustafson FTS Plus+ Representative Phone: 800.749.1724 info@ftsplus.com
